ARABIC: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'I possess no power to do you harm or to guide you right.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "Neither is your loss within my power nor bringing you to guidance."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: “Surely neither it is in my power to hurt you nor to bring you to the Right Way.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "I do not possess any power to harm or benefit you".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I am not the master of any harm or benefit for you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "It is not in my power to cause you harm, or to bring you to the right path."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: I do not control for you evil or good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'Surely I possess no power over you, either for hurt or for rectitude.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Lo! I control not hurt nor benefit for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "It is not in my power to cause you either harm or good?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: 'verily own not for you power of hurt nor of benefit
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘I have no power to bring you any harm or good [of my own accord].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "It is not in my power to cause you harm, or to bring you to right conduct."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say: "It is not in my power to cause you harm, or to bring you to the Right Path."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Indeed, I possess no power over you, either for harm or for guidance'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “It is not in my power to harm you, nor to bring you to right conduct.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [72:21] Say: ‘I truly have no power to bring you any harm, to lead [you] astray, or any guidance’, any good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Say) Muhammad, to the people of Mecca: (Lo! I control not hurt) I cannot drive away from you harm, forsakenness or chastisement (nor benefit for you) nor can I give you benefit and guidance.
